results.title: U.S. Eyes Trade Deals With Allies to Ease Clash Over Electric Car Subsidies
results.abstract: The Biden administration has faced backlash in Europe and Asia over its plans to bolster electric vehicle and battery production.

results.title: Black Ice and White Knuckles: Braving the Elements on Iceland’s Ring Road
results.abstract: In summer, the roughly 830-mile route offers drivers midnight sun, along with plenty of traffic. Other times of the year, its snowy delights are more solitary, and slippery.
